name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Neil Werner PRICE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Price

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Neil Werner PRICE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of March, 1999, the request for oral argument is granted. The parties are directed to specifically address the issue of attorneys making baseless accusations and the appropriate discipline therefor.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
727 A.2d 112
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Neil Werner PRICE, Respondent.
No. 486 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 15, 1999.
